author: Ben Fuller
content: Time for Ukraine to issue letters of marque and reprisal? Lots of Russian potential prizes out there.

author: DAVID RYE
content:
Ukrainian rescue & salvage vessel Saphire (Сапфир) siezed off Snake Island by Russian Navy a few days ago – now pictured impounded in Sevastapol.
Alongside patrol vessel Dmitry Rogachev – sister of Vasily Bykov apparently sunk last week.
See -https://twitter.com/NavyLookout/status/1502720675160768516

Who is telling the truth?
